price: Uyu ni wo munsi w’urubanza mwajyaga muhinyura.
arabic: هَٰذَا يَوۡمُ ٱلۡفَصۡلِ ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: hādhā yawmu al-faṣli alladhī kuntum bihi tukadhibūna
